column5: thats a great day of fishing !! some real nice smallies there and a nice eye to boot !!!
gorgeous bass...very nice strategy on using the sandwich to your advantage
Oh my God! That's a football!
Nice fish!!!  I grew up in Niagara Falls and that river has huge fish of every species.  The lower is awesome for salmon come september as well...good job!! bill
wow.. what a football ... nice smallie.. congratz on your pb
Here piggy piggy piggy   What a beaut!!!
Thank you everyone, I am still amazed by my luck that day
Wow, I missed this post when it first came up, awesome smallie!!!
What a smb!  That is the biggest i've seen on this forum i think.  Good job
WOW  What a HOG of a football!  WOW

What a great afternoon on the Upper, the lake was rough at Crystal so we launched at Fort Erie. The Smallies were on!! typical baits, tubes (dark colours). Around Strawberry Island I decided to put on a small Muskie bait (small Grandma lure) and troll for a bit, maybe pick up a small ski or a large walleye or bass. Just as I am taking a bite of my sandwich SLAM!! something hits the Grandma!! It was heavy, I am thinking ski or large walleye, it's not coming up. I get it up to the boat and its a monster smallie. John hoists in the net, its aboard, and we giggle like school girls. It measured 22.5 inches long and an incredible 19 inch girth, what a pig. Lots of bass were caught in the 2 to 3 lb range by both of us and to cap the evening off, I picked up a 22 inch Wally at the river mouth before getting off the water at around 9pm.  here are the pictures
Nice when in spite of the winds and waves, things come together to make a good day great. That truly is a great SMB! Well done.
What a hawg! Congrats
hogs

Nice Smallie that was a hog. I was out on Erie today trying for smallie but it was way to wavy so I headed home before any thing horrible happened nice work on that smallie though and congrats on the PB.
Great fish!
Huge smallies, congrats bud!!!
Thats a huge river fish, very nice!
WOW! what a football of a smallie, congrats
Nice bunch of fish there - thanks for sharing.
wow those bass are huge! nice
Great ones.  Just think what it would look like in September.
Man Rizzo... look at that Musky food !!!!

Errrr....ahhhhh.....the lake calmed down as the morning went on but it wasn't really that bad at all.......fished Waverly Shoal which is about 5 miles out from where I launch....didn't do great but at least OK on walleyes....talked to a couple of Canadians that were fishing for bass but they weren't having any luck today...  Here's what I mustered up before it got TOO hot for this old timer....LOL...
Been there. Crap weather and winds pick up. Get home and alls calm.One never knows.
YEP....ME TOO....sometime TOO OFTEN then we like to admit....
huuuuge bass oh my gosh
nice hog small mouth
thats a pig smallie for sure
Holy freaking cow!
Superb smallie man!!!
really nice lookin bass...
No R.C. I loooked closely at the pictures and it is a bass. HUGE bass.
I beg to differ, but that was a Holy Freakin Cow !!!!!  I could tell by the bronze stripey things on its sides
some real nice chunks there the one is down right obese
